posts.text: 采用 github Pages + Hexo 搭建 hexo命令 1hexo d -g 配置 Tags和category url - 主题ICARUS https://ppoffice.github.io/hexo-theme-icarus/ Hexo Icarus主题配置完全手册 公式渲染测试 This is inline expression: $ax^2+bx+c>0$. This is a block expression:$$\displaystyle \frac{1}{\Bigl(\sqrt{\phi \sqrt{5}}-\phi\Bigr) e^{\frac25 \pi}} =1+\frac{e^{-2\pi}} {1+\frac{e^{-4\pi}} {1+\frac{e^{-6\pi}}{1+\frac{e^{-8\pi}} {1+\cdots} } } }$$ Or use $LaTeX$ environment: \begin{equation} A = \begin{bmatrix} a & b \\ c & c \end{bmatrix} \end{equation}
